dialog.text:
Blades of Exile is brought to you by Spiderweb Software -
"Where our aberrations become your reality."
"Blades of Exile" and Spiderweb Software are trademarks of Spiderweb Software.

Open Blades of Exile is sustained by the hard work of passionate volunteers. We sincerely hope you enjoy, share, and discuss this game, and maybe even make and release your own scenario!
Open Blades of Exile is a modification of Blades of Exile, created by Spiderweb Software, Inc. in 1997. It is released under GNU GPL 2.0+. The source code can be found here:

Comments and questions? The maintainers of Open Blades of Exile want to hear them.
Open a ticket here:
